meanings.definition: A family of insects known for their predatory habits.
meanings.sent1: The reduviids hunt other bugs for food.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the behavior of reduviids in the wild.
meanings.sent3: The reduviids decided to have a bug-catching competition for fun.
meanings.sent4: In the insect world, reduviids are the skilled hunters.
meanings.sent5: The reduviids' predatory nature makes them fascinating creatures to observe.

meanings.sent1: I saw a group of reduviids crawling on the tree trunk.
meanings.sent2: The reduviids' distinctive markings help them blend into their surroundings.
meanings.sent3: The reduviids threw a family picnic under the leafy canopy.
meanings.sent4: Among all insects, reduviids stand out as unique family members.
meanings.sent5: The reduviids' close-knit family structure ensures their survival in the wild.

meanings.definition: Insects that belong to the Reduviidae family.
meanings.sent1: Reduviids have a wide range of sizes and colors.
meanings.sent2: People often mistake reduviids for harmless bugs due to their appearance.
meanings.sent3: The reduviids organized a family reunion in the garden.
meanings.sent4: In the insect kingdom, reduviids proudly represent their family heritage.
meanings.sent5: The unique features of reduviids make them easy to identify among other insects.
